DOC.brief_summary: Study to investigate the safety and efficacy of daily use of JARDIANCE速 Tablets in Japanese elderly patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus.
DOC.brief_title: Daily Use of JARDIANCE速 Tablets in Japanese Elderly Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Male and female elderly patients (age 65 and over) with type 2 diabetes mellitus who have never been treated with JARDIANCE速 Tablets before the enrolment and start taking JARDIANCE速 Tablets within 3 months after launch in Japan Exclusion criteria:
